basic_information.scholarship_name: Piper Family Scholarship for the Arts

description: This scholarship was generously established in 2013 by Britt and Jean Piper to fuel a creative partnership between the initiatives of the Piper family and UCOÂ’s art program. Eligibility Art major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Sophomore, junior or senior Pursuing a bachelor's degree Requirements 5-10 images of your artwork 250-word essay answering the question, "where do you see your art taking you in the course of your life, both professionally and personally?" Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
